title: Billionaire's Island Bride
description: NEW YORK TIMES and USA TODAY Best-selling Author, Judy Angelo, IN AUDIO FORMAT*THE BILLIONAIRE BROTHERHOOD volume 3:BAD BOY BILLIONAIRE VERSUS REBEL ISLAND BRIDE - AND THE WINNER IS...Normally shy and reserved, college student Erin Samuels goes to the island of Santa Marta where she breaks out of her shell and does things that shock even her. And, as if that weren't bad enough, she ends up trapped in a marriage by blackmail!Dare DeSouza is used to women throwing themselves at him and he lumps Erin Samuels in the same category. Gold-diggers, that's what they all are, but this time he has a plan. He sets out to teach Erin a lesson she'll never forget...and ends up learning the greatest lesson of his life.An island romance that will keep readers guessing every step of the way...TOP AMAZON CUSTOMER out of 5 stars sweet romanceReviewed in the United States on July 9, 2013Verified PurchaseThis was such a good book. I really connected with Erin throughout the story. Dare was a wealthy man use to women throwing themselves at him. He thought that was what Erin was like. He thought she was a gold digger. Boy was he shocked later on in the story when he found out she didn't even know who he was, or how much he was worth. This ended up being a really sweet romance. Erin, and Dare had some up's and downs but it made them a stronger couple in the end. I could feel the love between them.
author: Judy Angelo
